DOC.brief_summary: According literature management depressive disorder primary care level always consistent guideline . The main objective study test whether Comprehensive Technology-Assisted Training Supervision Program improve depression management Primary Health Care clinic Santiago , Chile .
DOC.detailed_description: A cluster randomize control clinical trial conduct four Primary Health Care ( PHC ) clinic Santiago , Chile . The sample selection PHC clinic perform two step . Firstly , two urban municipality Santiago Metropolitan Region , Chile , randomly select work Faculty Medicine U.Chile least two PHC.Municipalities high Human Development Index , high percentage immigrant old population , Psychiatry resident work PHC , excluded.Secondly select municipality , two PHC randomly select active control arm . To detect difference 20 % , one-sided model , alpha 5 % power 80 % , 152 depressed person , 76 group , require study . A design effect 2.42 estimate . After apply design effect sample need increase 368 depressed person . Considering retention rate approximately 85 % , 434 depressed case need require study , hence 109 case 4 primary health care clinic . Analysis presentation result accordance CONSORT guideline randomize clinical trial , primary comparative analysis conduct intention treat basis due emphasis place confidence interval between-arm comparison . Initially descriptive analysis assess balance two group conduct . The primary analysis employ multilevel multivariable lineal regression investigate difference PHQ-9 score group 3 6 month randomization , adjust baseline outcome variable score . Sensitivity analysis make different assumption conduct investigate potential effect miss data . Similar analysis do secondary outcome measure .
